mapper.select: select evd.* from prs_ver_mas_qual qual_rel inner join prs_model_qual_evd qual_evd on qual_rel.qual_code = qual_evd.qual_code inner join bas_evd_info evd on evd.`code` = qual_evd.evd_code left join bas_evd_data `data` on `data`.evd_code = qual_evd.evd_code and `data`.entity_code = #{entityCode} and `data`.time_value = #{taskYear} where qual_rel.ver_mas_id = #{verMasId} and `data`.id is null
